metadata.description: CAPTAIN AMERICA and FALCON are off to Lagos to take down a rogue ex-Hydra operative. But are they looking for the right man?  Follow BUCKY BARNES, BROCK RUMLOW and STEVE ROGERS as they each cope with the fall-out from the events of CAPTAIN AMERICA: THE WINTER SOLDIER. While Bucky is haunted by the ghosts of his past, he tries to uncover the mystery of his origin. Meanwhile, Rumlow examines his loyalties in the aftermath of the Triskelion explosion. Can anyone be trusted? Find out in this prelude to CAPTAIN AMERICA: CIVIL WAR!
metadata.name: Marvel's Captain America: Civil War Prelude Infinite Comic
